title: Roast Beef Summer Rolls
description: Vietnamese summer rolls are often filled with or shrimp, but Grace Parisi makes hers with roast beef from the deli.

title: Arctic Char with Soba and Green Beans
description: A very refreshing and bright soba noodle salad with green beans, radishes, romaine and fresh basil, and serves it with perfectly crisp pieces of arctic char!!!

title: Ultimate Chocolate Mousse
description: This is the ultimate, the definitive, the ne plus ultra, the finest chocolate mousse creation ever whipped up.
